t: Amazon Music for Artists - Amazon Music for Artists

t: Amazon Music - Wikipedia
s: April 27, 2025 - Amazon Music (previously Amazon MP3) is a music streaming platform and digital music store operated by Amazon. As of January 2020, the service had 55 million subscribers. It was the first music store to sell music without digital rights management (DRM) from the four major music labels (EMI,¬†...
